files.patch:
@@ -853,9 +853,9 @@
-    <Field type="long" contentType="hertz" name="ingress" label="Ingress" description="Number of added requests per second"/>

-    <Field type="long" name="added" label="Added"/>
-    <Field type="long" name="removed" label="Removed"/>
-    <Field type="long" name="totalAdded" label="Total Added"/>
-    <Field type="long" name="totalRemoved" label="Total Removed"/>
-    <Field type="int" name="compilerThreadCount" label="Number of Compiler Threads for this queue"/>
+    <Field type="long" contentType="hertz" name="addedRate" label="Requets Added Rate" description="Requests added per second"/>
+    <Field type="long" contentType="hertz" name="removedRate" label="Requests Removed Rate" description="Requests removed per second"/>
+    <Field type="long" name="queueSize" label="Queue Size"/>
